verses.verse: Maschil<WH4905> of Ethan<WH387> the Ezrahite<WH250>. I will sing<WH7891> of the mercies<WH2617> of the LORD<WH3068> for ever<WH5769>: with my mouth<WH6310> will I make known<WH3045> thy faithfulness<WH530> to all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>. Maschil: or, A Psalm for Ethan the Ezrahite, to give instruction to all: Heb. to generation and generation
For I have said<WH559>, Mercy<WH2617> shall be built up<WH1129> for ever<WH5769>: thy faithfulness<WH530> shalt thou establish<WH3559> in the very heavens<WH8064>.
I have made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with my chosen<WH972>, I have sworn<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>,
Thy seed<WH2233> will I establish<WH3559> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, and build up<WH1129> thy throne<WH3678> to all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>. Selah<WH5542>.
And the heavens<WH8064> shall praise<WH3034> thy wonders<WH6382>, O LORD<WH3068>: thy faithfulness<WH530> also in the congregation<WH6951> of the saints<WH6918>.
For who in the heaven<WH7834> can be compared<WH6186> unto the LORD<WH3068>? who among the sons<WH1121> of the mighty<WH410> can be likened<WH1819> unto the LORD<WH3068>?
God<WH410> is greatly<WH7227> to be feared<WH6206> in the assembly<WH5475> of the saints<WH6918>, and to be had in reverence<WH3372> of all them that are about<WH5439> him.
O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, who is a strong<WH2626> LORD<WH3050> like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness<WH530> round about<WH5439> thee?
Thou rulest<WH4910> the raging<WH1348> of the sea<WH3220>: when the waves<WH1530> thereof arise<WH7721>, thou stillest<WH7623> them.

Thou hast broken<WH1792> Rahab<WH7294> in pieces<WH1792>, as one that is slain<WH2491>; thou hast scattered<WH6340> thine enemies<WH341> with thy strong<WH5797> arm<WH2220>. Rahab: or, Egypt thy: Heb. the arm of thy strength
The heavens<WH8064> are thine, the earth<WH776> also is thine: as for the world<WH8398> and the fulness<WH4393> thereof, thou hast founded<WH3245> them. the fulness: or, all it containeth
The north<WH6828> and the south<WH3225> thou hast created<WH1254> them: Tabor<WH8396> and Hermon<WH2768> shall rejoice<WH7442> in thy name<WH8034>.
Thou hast a mighty<WH1369> arm<WH2220>: strong<WH5810> is thy hand<WH3027>, and high<WH7311> is thy right hand<WH3225>. a: Heb. an arm with might
Justice<WH6664> and judgment<WH4941> are the habitation<WH4349> of thy throne<WH3678>: mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> shall go<WH6923> before thy face<WH6440>. habitation: or, establishment
Blessed<WH835> is the people<WH5971> that know<WH3045> the joyful sound<WH8643>: they shall walk<WH1980>, O LORD<WH3068>, in the light<WH216> of thy countenance<WH6440>.
In thy name<WH8034> shall they rejoice<WH1523> all the day<WH3117>: and in thy righteousness<WH6666> shall they be exalted<WH7311>.
For thou art the glory<WH8597> of their strength<WH5797>: and in thy favour<WH7522> our horn<WH7161> shall be exalted<WH7311> <WH7311>.
For the LORD<WH3068> is our defence<WH4043>; and the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478> is our king<WH4428>. the LORD: or, our shield is of the LORD, and our king is of the Holy One of Israel

Then thou spakest<WH1696> in vision<WH2377> to thy holy one<WH2623>, and saidst<WH559>, I have laid<WH7737> help<WH5828> upon one that is mighty<WH1368>; I have exalted<WH7311> one chosen<WH977> out of the people<WH5971>.
I have found<WH4672> David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>; with my holy<WH6944> oil<WH8081> have I anointed<WH4886> him:
With whom my hand<WH3027> shall be established<WH3559>: mine arm<WH2220> also shall strengthen<WH553> him.
The enemy<WH341> shall not exact<WH5378> upon him; nor the son<WH1121> of wickedness<WH5766> afflict<WH6031> him.
And I will beat down<WH3807> his foes<WH6862> before his face<WH6440>, and plague<WH5062> them that hate<WH8130> him.
But my faithfulness<WH530> and my mercy<WH2617> shall be with him: and in my name<WH8034> shall his horn<WH7161> be exalted<WH7311>.
I will set<WH7760> his hand<WH3027> also in the sea<WH3220>, and his right hand<WH3225> in the rivers<WH5104>.
He shall cry<WH7121> unto me, Thou art my father<WH1>, my God<WH410>, and the rock<WH6697> of my salvation<WH3444>.
Also I will make<WH5414> him my firstborn<WH1060>, higher<WH5945> than the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776>.
My mercy<WH2617> will I keep<WH8104> for him for evermore<WH5769>, and my covenant<WH1285> shall stand fast<WH539> with him.
His seed<WH2233> also will I make<WH7760> to endure for ever<WH5703>, and his throne<WH3678> as the days<WH3117> of heaven<WH8064>.
If his children<WH1121> forsake<WH5800> my law<WH8451>, and walk<WH3212> not in my judgments<WH4941>;
If they break<WH2490> my statutes<WH2708>, and keep<WH8104> not my commandments<WH4687>; break: Heb. profane
Then will I visit<WH6485> their transgression<WH6588> with the rod<WH7626>, and their iniquity<WH5771> with stripes<WH5061>.
Nevertheless my lovingkindness<WH2617> will I not utterly take<WH6331> from him, nor suffer my faithfulness<WH530> to fail<WH8266>. will: Heb. I will not make void from him to fall: Heb. to lie
My covenant<WH1285> will I not break<WH2490>, nor alter<WH8138> the thing that is gone out<WH4161> of my lips<WH8193>.
Once<WH259> have I sworn<WH7650> by my holiness<WH6944> that I will not lie<WH3576> unto David<WH1732>. that: Heb. if I lie
His seed<WH2233> shall endure for ever<WH5769>, and his throne<WH3678> as the sun<WH8121> before me.
It shall be established<WH3559> for ever<WH5769> as the moon<WH3394>, and as a faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> in heaven<WH7834>. Selah<WH5542>.
But thou hast cast off<WH2186> and abhorred<WH3988>, thou hast been wroth<WH5674> with thine anointed<WH4899>.
Thou hast made void<WH5010> the covenant<WH1285> of thy servant<WH5650>: thou hast profaned<WH2490> his crown<WH5145> by casting it to the ground<WH776>.
Thou hast broken down<WH6555> all his hedges<WH1448>; thou hast brought<WH7760> his strong holds<WH4013> to ruin<WH4288>.
All that pass by<WH5674> the way<WH1870> spoil<WH8155> him: he is a reproach<WH2781> to his neighbours<WH7934>.
Thou hast set up<WH7311> the right hand<WH3225> of his adversaries<WH6862>; thou hast made all his enemies<WH341> to rejoice<WH8055>.
Thou hast also turned<WH7725> the edge<WH6697> of his sword<WH2719>, and hast not made him to stand<WH6965> in the battle<WH4421>.
Thou hast made his glory<WH2892> to cease<WH7673>, and cast<WH4048> his throne<WH3678> down<WH4048> to the ground<WH776>. glory: Heb. brightness
The days<WH3117> of his youth<WH5934> hast thou shortened<WH7114>: thou hast covered<WH5844> him with shame<WH955>. Selah<WH5542>.
How long, LORD<WH3068>? wilt thou hide<WH5641> thyself for ever<WH5331>? shall thy wrath<WH2534> burn<WH1197> like fire<WH784>?
Remember<WH2142> how short<WH2465> my time is: wherefore hast thou made<WH1254> all men<WH1121> <WH120> in vain<WH7723>?
What man<WH1397> is he that liveth<WH2421>, and shall not see<WH7200> death<WH4194>? shall he deliver<WH4422> his soul<WH5315> from the hand<WH3027> of the grave<WH7585>? Selah<WH5542>.
Lord<WH136>, where are thy former<WH7223> lovingkindnesses<WH2617>, which thou swarest<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> in thy truth<WH530>?
Remember<WH2142>, Lord<WH136>, the reproach<WH2781> of thy servants<WH5650>; how I do bear<WH5375> in my bosom<WH2436> the reproach of all the mighty<WH7227> people<WH5971>;
Wherewith thine enemies<WH341> have reproached<WH2778>, O LORD<WH3068>; wherewith they have reproached<WH2778> the footsteps<WH6119> of thine anointed<WH4899>.
Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068> for evermore<WH5769>. Amen<WH543>, and Amen<WH543>.
